thread.title: Social Circle offense loses spark against Crawford Co.
thread.title_full: Social Circle offense loses spark against Crawford Co.

author: David Johnson
title: Social Circle offense loses spark against Crawford Co.
text:
Social Circle offense loses spark against Crawford Co. Redskins suffer key injury in 41-26 loss to the Eagles Social Circle offense loses spark against Crawford Co. By David Johnson WaltonTribune.com | 0 comments 
Social Circle quarterback Blake Brock was already having a tough game Friday night at Redskins Field, completing just one of his first 12 passes. On his 13th attempt, it turned disastrous, both for the junior signal caller and his team. 
Scrambling from a rush with just 17 seconds left in the first half, Brock released a pass just before taking a hit. He crumpled to the ground and had to be carried from the field.
